ExpLcdDevice Class Reference

CoAction Hero LCD Expansion board class. More...

#include <ExpLcdDevice.hpp>

Inheritance diagram for ExpLcdDevice:
Collaboration diagram for ExpLcdDevice:

Detailed Description

This is the implementation of the Nhdc12832 when using the CoAction Hero's LCD device board.

Here is an example of drawing on the LCD:

ExpLcdDevice lcd;
lcd.clear();
lcd.setline(0,0, lcd.xmax(), lcd.ymax());
lcd.refresh();
